text: Ezɨ mɨdorozim tɨghar akuighɨrɨghasava amima, Atrivim Ahap kamaghɨn Atrivim Jehosafat mɨgei, “Ga mɨdorozim bagh mangɨ, kɨ uan atrivir korotiaba sueghɨva korotiar igharazitabar aghuightɨ, mɨdorozir gumaziba nan atamangɨgham. Eghtɨ nɨ uan atrivir korotiabar aghuigh.” Egha Israelian atrivim korotiar igharaziba aghuigha aning mɨdorozim bagha zui.
